channel.title: 317 client closes by it self
channel.description:
ok every client i get and when i run it just closes after like 20 secs and the source cmd ses this
ClientHandler: Client (name) disconnected.
any idias whats wrong? ill rep++ if u help

item.title: 317 client closes by it self
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

[quote=“db0wzz, post:3, topic:358059”]This happens to me also, i got it fixed for a while but now it aint working anymore for the PI client i have.

but, try going into runclient.bat or w/e and if u see, “Start Javaw” replace with “C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” and replace if ur java location is different.

Hope i helped.

and btw, i assume ur on a Windows 7 comp

yes im using windows 7 and when i used xp it works perfectly[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: 317 client closes by it self
item.dc:creator: @db0wzz db0wzz
item.description:
@db0wzz wrote:

This happens to me also, i got it fixed for a while but now it aint working anymore for the PI client i have.

but, try going into runclient.bat or w/e and if u see, “Start Javaw” replace with “C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” and replace if ur java location is different.

Hope i helped.

and btw, i assume ur on a Windows 7 comp
